meanings.sent1: The old house had a pantiled roof.
meanings.sent2: The pantiled roof protected the building from rain.
meanings.sent3: The pantiled roof looked like a checkerboard from afar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pantiled as the colorful roof tiles.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the pantiled roof, creating a beautiful pattern.

meanings.sent1: The pantiled house was a unique sight in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The pantiled structure stood out among the other buildings.
meanings.sent3: The pantiled walls seemed to shimmer in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were as pantiled as the intricate roof design.
meanings.sent5: The pantiled building showcased exquisite craftsmanship.

meanings.sent1: The table was pantiled, giving it a rustic charm.
meanings.sent2: The pantiled floor felt cool under her feet.
meanings.sent3: The pantiled vase added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as pantiled as the roof of the house.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with pantiled ornaments.
